snippet.title: Dad's First Job
snippet.description: When dadÂ’s first job warps the very fabric of the universe, the rest of the Wattersons set out to stop him. Watch more of The Amazing World of Gumball on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Glue Trap Brakes
snippet.description: Giant mouse Ali tests whether a giant glue trap will work as brakes for a three-wheeler. Watch Dude, What Would Happen on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Thanks for the Glue
snippet.description: Banana Joe gets himself into a sticky situation. Watch more of The Amazing World of Gumball on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Quick-Drying Glue
snippet.description: A tornado touches down in Nowhere, but Muriel gets stuck to her rocking chair. Watch more Courage the Cowardly Dog on CartoonNetwork.com!

snippet.title: Lipstuck
snippet.description: When your yappy friends won't shut up, give them the gift of Lipstuck. Watch more MAD on Cartoon Network!

snippet.title: Glue Escape Racing Game
snippet.description: Battle Bad Cop in a LEGO demolition derby!
